derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from modern Latin plusperfectum, from Latin (tempus praeteritum) plus quam perfectum ('past tense) more than perfect'

entry.def: The pluperfect is the same as the past perfect .

means.word_mean: 1. a perfective tense used to express action completed in the past;

sentences.sentence: "`I had finished' is an example of the past perfect"
